headline: ADP’s 50-Year Dividend Streak and AI Pivot Might Change The Case For Investing In Automatic Data Processing (ADP)
summary: Automatic Data Processing recently marked its 50th consecutive year of dividend increases with a 10% quarterly hike, supported by free cash flow of US$4.80 billion against US$2.40 billion of dividend payments. This long-running dividend growth streak, combined with ADP’s push into AI-powered payroll and HR automation tools, highlights how the company is balancing income returns with ongoing reinvestment in its core platform. Next, we’ll examine how ADP’s entry into Dividend King territory...
